NAME: giveLoadout
DESCRIPTION: Gives the player their currently selected class

NAME: giveKillstreak
PARAMETERS ( / REPRESENTS A COMMA ): ( streakName/ isEarned/ awardXp/ owner/ slotNumber/ streakID )

NAME: setWeaponAmmoClip
DESCRIPTION: Set your weapon ammo to the value given.

NAME: getStatMode
DESCRIPTION: This function will return rankedPlayerData or zombiePlayerData (depending on gametype)

NAME: playerUnlimitedAmmo
DESCRIPTION: this enables unlimited ammo on the caller

NAME: getTacticalWeapon
DESCRIPTION: this will return the callers tactical weapon slot

NAME: getLethalWeapon
DESCRIPTION: this will return the callers lethal weapon slot
